text: Can you help me modify a reminder?
Of course, what do you want to change in the reminder?
I want to change the description to "Submit report" and the time to "2023-03-17 09:00:00".
Alright, I need your token to access your reminders. Can you please provide your username and password?
My username is testuser and password is testpass.

Thank you. Now, to modify your reminder, the API needs the token, the new content and the new time. Please confirm if the new content should be "Submit report" and the new time should be "2023-03-17 09:00:00"?
Yes, that's correct.
Your reminder has been modified. Is there anything else you need help with?
Yes, can you help me add an agenda?
Sure, what information do you want to add for the agenda?
I want to add "Dinner with friends" at "Cheesecake Factory" on "2023-03-20".
To add a new agenda, I need your token. Can you please provide your username and password?
My username is testuser and password is testpass.

Thank you. To add the agenda, the API needs the token, the content, the time and the location. Please confirm if the content is "Dinner with friends", the time is "2023-03-20" and the location is "Cheesecake Factory".
Yes, those are correct.
Your agenda has been added successfully. Is there anything else you need help with?
Can you also help me delete the same agenda?

Sure, to delete the agenda, the API needs the token, the content, the time and the location. Please confirm if the content is "Dinner with friends", the time is "2023-03-20" and the location is "Cheesecake Factory".
Yes, it is.
Your agenda has been deleted successfully. Is there anything else you need help with?
